title: Power BI Mastery
description: Master Power BI to transform data into actionable insights. This comprehensive course covers data visualization, dashboard creation, DAX functions, Power Query, and advanced reporting techniques to help you create compelling, data-driven stories.
about: This course provides in-depth knowledge of Power BI, covering the entire process from importing data to creating advanced reports and dashboards. Learn how to use Power Query for data transformation, apply DAX for complex calculations, and design visually compelling reports for business decision-makers.

highlights.name: Data Transformation with Power Query
highlights.description: Learn how to import, clean, and transform data using Power Query Editor.

highlights.name: Data Modeling with DAX
highlights.description: Master Data Analysis Expressions (DAX) to create powerful formulas for reports.

highlights.name: Interactive Dashboards
highlights.description: Create interactive and visually appealing dashboards for business insights.

highlights.name: Power BI Service and Power BI Desktop
highlights.description: Learn how to publish and share reports using Power BI Service and integrate with Power BI Desktop.

highlights.name: Advanced Reporting Techniques
highlights.description: Explore advanced reporting capabilities such as drill-through, bookmarks, and custom visuals.

roles.title: Data Analyst
roles.description: Analyze data and create interactive reports and dashboards for business analysis using Power BI.

roles.title: Business Intelligence Developer
roles.description: Design, develop, and deploy BI solutions using Power BI for decision-making and reporting.

roles.title: Data Scientist
roles.description: Work with large datasets to derive insights and create reports that inform strategic decisions.

roles.title: Report Developer
roles.description: Create data-driven reports and dashboards to support business intelligence initiatives.

faq.question: Do I need prior experience with Power BI for this course?
faq.answer: No prior experience is required. The course starts with the basics and progresses to advanced features.

faq.question: What tools will I need for this course?
faq.answer: You will need a computer with Power BI Desktop installed. Power BI Service is available online for sharing reports.

faq.question: What kind of projects will I work on during the course?
faq.answer: You will create interactive dashboards, data reports for various business cases, and work on real-world datasets.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?
faq.answer: Yes, a certificate will be provided upon successful completion of the course.

faq.question: Can I share my Power BI reports online?
faq.answer: Yes, you will learn how to publish reports to Power BI Service and share them with stakeholders.
